title: Implementing Educational Philosophy via Music Repertoire Selection: Backward Design-Based Social Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of music education and elementary teaching experience
context.additional_context: Course for professionals to develop competencies in selecting music repertoires for elementary education settings. Developing practical solutions through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can establish clear educational objectives when selecting music repertoires by applying the backward design model
Learners can develop music repertoire evaluation criteria reflecting social values and educational purposes
Learners can propose music repertoire selection strategies applicable to elementary education settings by collaborating on digital tool-based projects
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
